Title: Enacts the "children and recovering mothers (CHARM) act"
Summary: Enacts the "children and recovering mothers (CHARM) act" to provide guidance, education and assistance to healthcare providers caring for expectant mothers with substance use disorder; provides for the screening of newborns for substance abuse exposure.
LawCode: Add Art 25 Title 4-A §§2576 - 2579, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to children and recovering mothers
